original_text: If you receive people like that as Christian people, you are making yourself the same as them. You also are doing the same kind of bad work.
korean_text: 그에게 인사하는 자는 그 악한 일에 참여하는 자임이라

sentences.original_text: If you receive people like that
you are making yourself the same as them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 자신을 그들과 동일하게 만들고 있는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: the same kind of bad work
